TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback(context As HttpContext) As String
type HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback = delegate of HttpContext -> string

param.name: context
param.span: 包含对页的 HTTP 请求信息的 ，该页带有需要缓存后替换的控件。

span.span: The that contains the HTTP request information for the page with the control that requires post-cache substitution.

summary.span: 表示处理缓存后替换的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles post-cache substitution.

returns.span: 在发送到客户端之前插入到缓存的响应的内容。

span.span: The content inserted into the cached response before being sent to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托与方法结合使用，用于为和控件呈现缓存后内容。 The delegate, in combination with the method, is used for rendering post-cache content for the and controls. 对于控件，请使用属性指定在执行控件时要调用的回调方法的名称。 For the control, use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 指定的回调方法必须是页面上或包含控件的用户控件上的静态方法。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or on the user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须与 采用参数并返回字符串的委托的签名匹配。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 对于控件，呈现与页缓存无关，除非为事件提供事件处理程序。 For the control, rendering is independent of the page caching unless an event handler is provided for the event. 如果不存在事件处理程序，则使用后缓存替换来呈现内容。If no event handler is present, post-cache substitution is used to render the content. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将控件添加到输出缓存的网页中。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 加载页面时，将在标签中向用户显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 页面的此部分缓存并每隔60秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时，它会`GetCurrentDateTime`调用方法，该方法必须与委托的签名匹配。 When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method, which must match the signature for the delegate. `GetCurrentDateTime`方法返回的字符串将向用户显示。The string that is returned by the `GetCurrentDateTime` method is displayed to the user. 页面的此部分不会缓存，并在每次刷新页面时更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. 控件的属性获取或设置回调方法的名称。The property of the control gets or sets the name of the callback method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分

span.span: Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page
